title: Google Pixel 2XL keeps restarting in a Boot Loop. I dont want to loose my data. Any respite?
content: I have removed fingerprint sign-in and after 2days phone becomes un-usable with this *Boot-Loop* restarting problem. I have no backup of my data believing in brand Google and now I don't want to loose my data(not just videos/images but many other things). Please get my data back(recovery with other tools won't work for me) and I'm ready pay anything for my original data.
